name: locale
description: Figma plugin supporting for Aperia DS

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run build
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:main && npm run tsc:ui
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n plugin,iframe "npm run tsc:main -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:ui -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:main -- --minify
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n plugin,iframe "npm run build:main -- --watch" "npm run build:ui -- --watch"
scripts.dev-old: concurrently -n ui,command 'pnpm run dev:ui' 'pnpm run dev:command -- --watch'

author: Tuan Au Duong
